title: Famous birthdays for Oct. 13: Marie Osmond, Nancy Kerrigan
text:
Oct. 13 (UPI) — Those born on this date are under the sign of Libra.

They include:

— American Revolutionary War heroine Molly Pitcher in 1754

— Editorial cartoonist Herbert Block in 1909

— Former British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in 1925

— Jesse L. Brown, the first African-American naval aviator, in 1926

— Actor Melinda Dillon in 1939 (age 80)

— Rock and Roll Hall of Fame member Paul Simon in 1941 (age 78)

— Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones in 1942 (age 77)

— Musician Robert Lamm in 1944 (age 75)

— Rocker Sammy Hagar in 1947 (age 72)

— Horse racing Hall of Fame member Pat Day in 1953 (age 66)

— Chris Carter, creator of The X-Files, in 1956 (age 63)

— Entertainer Marie Osmond in 1959 (age 60)

— NBA coach Doc Rivers in 1961 (age 58)

— Actor Kelly Preston in 1962 (age 57)

— Football Hall of Fame member Jerry Rice in 1962 (age 57)

— Cuban Olympic gold medal high jump specialist Javier Sotomayor in 1967 (age 52)

— Actor Kate Walsh in 1967 (age 52)

— Actor Tisha Campbell-Martin in 1968 (age 51)

— Figure skater Nancy Kerrigan in 1969 (age 50)

— Actor Sacha Baron Cohen in 1971 (age 48)

— Singer Ashanti Douglas in 1980 (age 39)

— Australian Olympic gold medal swimmer Ian Thorpe in 1982 (age 37)

— First daughter Tiffany Trump in 1993 (age 26)

— Actor Caleb McLaughlin in 2001 (age 18)
